content.query:
select top 10 *
from openrowset(
        --bulk 'https://rayfelipedlgen2account.dfs.core.windows.net/rayfelipedlgen2filesystem/OR OED/BasicJSONExample.json',
        bulk 'https://pandemicdatalake.blob.core.windows.net/public/curated/covid-19/ecdc_cases/latest/ecdc_cases.json1',
        format = 'csv',
        fieldterminator ='0x0b',
        fieldquote = '0x0b'
    ) with (doc nvarchar(max)) as rows
